alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 08 at 8:36AM MST until January 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Las Animas and Baca Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
